sentences.en: Morton examined the animal and noticed that the breathing and heartbeat were normal.

sentences.en: One evening Morton decided to put Davy's conclusion to the test.

sentences.en: Morton hardly heard the words of praise that came from his patient.
sentences.vi: Morton hầu như không nghe thấy những lời khen ngợi mà bệnh nhân đã tặng cho.
